description:
At the Strauss Law Offices in Westfield, New Jersey, we are proud to be the small firm with big results for our personal injury and medical malpractice clients. Our two convenient locations in Westfield, New Jersey, and Nanuet, New York, make us fully accessible to people in Essex, Bergen, Middlesex, Morris and Union counties and throughout all of New Jersey with convenient visits who seek the best and most dedicated litigation services available for substantial cases. We have convenient meeting locations throughout New Jersey.

We are a full-service litigation firm focusing our knowledge, skill and experience in the following areas:

• Motor vehicle accidents — car, truck, bus, motorcycle, pedestrian
• Medical malpractice — all types including failure to diagnose, birth injuries, medical errors, surgical errors, medication errors
• Spinal cord injuries — paralysis, paraplegia, quadriplegia
• Brain injuries- children and adults
• Burn injuries
• Construction injuries
• Wrongful Death cases

Our law offices also handle premises liability cases such as slip, trip and falls and product liability cases involving dangerous products. In addition, when a loved one dies as the result of someone else’s negligence or misconduct, we compassionately represent the grieving family members in their wrongful death action.

Personal Injury Requires Personal Attention

The Strauss Law Offices knows how devastating an accident or medical error can be for our clients. The injuries can be catastrophic and life-changing, and the costs can be extraordinary. Consequently, beginning with the free initial consultation, we take the time to get to know each client, fully understand his or her case and the applicable law, and develop the best strategy to obtain the compensation (s)he deserves and to which (s)he is entitled.

Our firm is proud of the record of settlements and jury verdicts we have achieved on behalf of our clients, many of them in the multimillion-dollar range. We likewise are proud that this record has earned us a national reputation, including our Lead Counsel rating by the Lead Counsel Review Board and our AV Preeminent* peer review rating by Martindale-Hubbell.

*AV®, AV Preeminent®, Martindale-Hubbell Distinguished and Martindale-Hubbell Notable are certification marks used under license in accordance with the Martindale-Hubbell certification procedures, standards and policies. Martindale-Hubbell® is the facilitator of a peer review rating process. Ratings reflect the anonymous opinions of members of the bar and the judiciary. Martindale-Hubbell® Peer Review Rating fall into two categories: legal ability and general ethical standards.
